Until GMOs are proven safe through rigorous, independent, long-term testing, they have no place on our plates or in our bodies. The onus is on industry to prove GMOs are safe, not on the public to prove they are unsafe. So far, they have failed to meet that burden of proof. We ignore the risks of GMOs at our own peril.
